title: Wintry showers could turn to snow in northern counties
description: Met Éireann has said wintry showers could turn to snow in northern counties, with temperatures dropping as low as -4C tomorrow night.
content:
Met Éireann has said wintry showers could turn to snow in northern counties, with temperatures dropping as low as -4C tomorrow night.
Senior forecaster Gerry Murphy said 2cm to 3cm of snow could be … [+3752 chars]
de: In den nördlichen Landkreisen könnten winterliche Schauer zu Schnee werden. Met Éireann sagte, dass winterliche Schauer in den nördlichen Landkreisen in Schnee übergehen könnten und die Temperaturen morgen Abend auf bis zu -4 °C sinken würden.
en: Wintry showers could turn to snow in northern counties. Met Éireann has said wintry showers could turn to snow in northern counties, with temperatures dropping as low as -4C tomorrow night.

title: Sweden issues three-day weather warnings due to snow and wind
description: Many parts of the country have already been hit by heavy snowfall and winds in recent days, and there's no sign of things slowing down yet, with new weather warnings issued for the coming weekend.
content:
Many parts of the country have already been hit by heavy snowfall and winds in recent days, and there's no sign of things slowing down yet, with new weather warnings issued for the coming weekend.
 … [+1415 chars]
de: Schweden gibt wegen Schnee und Wind dreitägige Wetterwarnungen heraus. Viele Teile des Landes wurden in den letzten Tagen bereits von starkem Schneefall und Wind heimgesucht, und es gibt noch keine Anzeichen dafür, dass sich die Lage verlangsamt, da für das kommende Wochenende neue Wetterwarnungen ausgegeben werden.
en: Sweden issues three-day weather warnings due to snow and wind. Many parts of the country have already been hit by heavy snowfall and winds in recent days, and there's no sign of things slowing down yet, with new weather warnings issued for the coming weekend.
la: Suetia monita tempestatum trium dierum ob nives et ventos exit. Multae patriae partes gravibus nix ac ventis proximis diebus iam percussi sunt, et nulla significatio rerum tarditatem adhuc, novis tempestatibus monitis in venturum weekend.

title: Your life-saving guide to travelling in snow
description: AMBER snow warnings have been issued for the UK, which sounds scary. But car journeys need not be hazardous with these simple precautions and a willingness to eat human flesh.
content:

de: Ihr lebensrettender Leitfaden für Reisen im Schnee. Für das Vereinigte Königreich wurden AMBER-Schneewarnungen ausgegeben, was beängstigend klingt. Mit diesen einfachen Vorsichtsmaßnahmen und der Bereitschaft, Menschenfleisch zu essen, müssen Autofahrten jedoch nicht gefährlich sein.

la: Vita tua salutaris dux ad iter in nive. AMBRIA nix admonitiones pro UK editae sunt, quae scary sonat. Sed cum his simplicibus cautelis et promptu ad manducandum carnem humanam, peregrinationes currus non oportet esse periculosum.

title: Parts of Alberta just saw some of the most snow they've ever seen in the month of December
description: As of Dec 28, communities including Grande Prairie, Banff and Fort McMurray had seen one of their wettest Decembers on record.
content:
Just as Edmonton saw a sharp spike in snowfall this December, other parts of Alberta also recorded some of their highest December precipitation volumes in decades. 
Experts say the unusually snowy s… [+3049 chars]
de: Teile von Alberta haben gerade im Dezember so viel Schnee gesehen, wie sie noch nie gesehen haben. Bis zum 28. Dezember erlebten Gemeinden wie Grande Prairie, Banff und Fort McMurray einen der regenreichsten Dezember seit Beginn der Aufzeichnungen.
en: Parts of Alberta just saw some of the most snow they've ever seen in the month of December. As of Dec 28, communities including Grande Prairie, Banff and Fort McMurray had seen one of their wettest Decembers on record.
la: Partes Albertae modo nonnullas nives maxime viderunt, quas mense Decembri umquam viderunt. Communitates ante diem octavum Kalendas Decembres, inclusas Communitates Grande Prairie, Banff et Fort McMurray unam ex decem Decembris in memoria viderunt.

title: Temperatures in Finnish Lapland plunge to -39.9C
description: A low-pressure front moving in from the southwest could bring up to 40cm of snow as well as temperatures of -25C in some areas of Finland over the coming days.
content:
Finnish Lapland has experienced a bone-chilling start to 2026, with a temperature of -39.9 degrees Celsius measured in the village of Kilpisjärvi in Enontekiö on Friday morning.
This was even colder… [+1773 chars]
